backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining consultancy and partner registration data models with CRUD-like submission, retrieval, and status-update functions stored in Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend project files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base style resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, loads the favicon, and mounts the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup configuring routing, theming, global layout, and providers.
frontend/src/components/CareerSection.ts: Empty placeholder file for the CareerSection component.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Empty placeholder file for the ContactSection component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with upgraded logo usage, social links, navigation buttons, and brand text pulled from branding constants.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation menus, and mobile menu handling using dropdowns and router navigation.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Scroll handler that forces window scroll to top on mount and on route changes using the router subscription.
frontend/src/components/SolarCalculatorA: UI card displaying solar calculation assumptions with badges for tariff, generation, space, and self‑consumption.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFab.tsx: Floating WhatsApp action button linking to a prefilled chat message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for submitting forms and fetching consultancy, partner, offerings, and solutions data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports logo asset paths and brand constants for Solar Sparkle.
frontend/src/lib/formatCurrency.ts: Utility functions for formatting Indian currency and numbers, including compact lakh/crore formatting.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar system sizing, cost, savings, and environmental impact calculations with input validation and roof-area constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Renders a careers page with upcoming job listings, benefits, and future roles.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialSolarPage.t: Displays commercial solar solution details, benefits, and a consultation CTA with imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ExpertConsultancyPage: Provides a form for users to request expert solar consultancy, handling validation and submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring solar calculator inputs, validation, result display, and promotional sections.
frontend/src/pages/HybridSystemPage.tsx: Presents a marketing page for hybrid solar systems with feature explanations, steps, and a call-to-action button. Includes imagery and navigation to the consultancy page.
frontend/src/pages/IndustrialSolarPage.t: Displays an industrial solar solutions page with high-capacity features, benefits cards, and navigation to an assessment request. Includes hero imagery and descriptive sections.
frontend/src/pages/OffGridSystemPage.tsx: Provides an overview of off-grid solar systems with explanations of system components, benefits, and imagery. Includes a CTA button linking to expert consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/OnGridSystemPage.tsx: Shows an on-grid solar system page with descriptions of grid-connected workflows, benefits, and a consultancy CTA. Contains visual sections and step-by-step explanations.
A residential solar marketing page featuring benefits, animated UI elements, imagery, and a consultancy CTA. Includes multiple feature cards highlighting advantages for homeowners.
frontend/src/pages/SolarAttaChakkiPage.t: React page describing a solar-powered atta chakki product with benefits, imagery, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/pages/SolarCalculatorPage.t: Empty or placeholder page with no content provided.
frontend/src/pages/SolarWaterPumpPage.ts: React page presenting a solar water pump product, highlighting key advantages and including a CTA button and product image.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedPartnerPage.ts: React page featuring a partner registration form with validation and submission logic plus promotional content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, logo‑upgrade requirements, and existing feature definitions.
